attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
as a member of RUSI and the IoD, I feel that in Britian today we require a new form of nation service, conscription.

a new conscription national service coulf support - the fire service, the police service, medial professions, as well as the army, navy and air force.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
